about.description: HijriDate is a Python package for converting between Hijri and Gregorian dates using the Umm al-Qura calendar. The package has been thoroughly verified and tested against original references to ensure its accuracy and reliability. It has an intuitive design, allows rich comparison and basic formatting of Hijri dates, and is optimized for performance.
about.summary: Accurate Hijri-Gregorian dates converter based on Umm al-Qura calendar

about.description: HijriDate is a Python package for converting between Hijri and Gregorian dates using the Umm al-Qura calendar. The package has been thoroughly verified and tested against original references to ensure its accuracy and reliability. It has an intuitive design, allows rich comparison and basic formatting of Hijri dates, and is optimized for performance.
about.summary: Accurate Hijri-Gregorian dates converter based on Umm al-Qura calendar

name: hijridate
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "hijridate" %}
{% set version = "2.5.0" %}

package:
  name: {{ name }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: b47f0b2e5333d5d898c6f3472f5cee4a3f045c82d69c073c7a026f5a7aec5821

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - pip
    - hatchling
    - hatch-fancy-pypi-readme
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}

test:
  imports:
    - hijridate
  requires:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}
  commands:
    - pip check

about:
  home: https://github.com/dralshehri/hijridate
  license: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: "Accurate Hijri-Gregorian dates converter based on Umm al-Qura calendar"
  description: >-
    HijriDate is a Python package for converting between Hijri and Gregorian dates
    using the Umm al-Qura calendar. The package has been thoroughly verified and tested
    against original references to ensure its accuracy and reliability. It has an
    intuitive design, allows rich comparison and basic formatting of Hijri dates, and
    is optimized for performance.
  doc_url: https://hijridate.readthedocs.io/

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - dralshehri
